alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 18 at 1:49PM CDT until March 21 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bovina. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 28.1 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Black River Bovina 28.0 27.9 Fri 1 pm CDT 28.1 28.0 27.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
